Articles.Content:
2 pages to go, people!

HYPE ON!!

Hypefireworks:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/OZGxu)
I think the HypeTrain is like a comet, it's periodic, accelerates as it approaches the sun, and possibly explodes on it's way there.

> 
> Hypefireworks:
> [http://imgur.com/a/OZGxu](http://imgur.com/a/OZGxu)

No 5 is my favorite. Next post starts page 99...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-23T21:52:35Z" title="04/23/2015 09:52  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 23, 2015</time> by Kylekov**

Just keep on adding **hype**rvelocity and we'll get there eventually.

Happy landings!

1 MORE PAGE GUYS!!!

Don't stop now!
I wonder if the average FPS will be improved in 1.0 alongside memory usage?
Man I can honestly say I have never had an issue with memory leak or fps in KSP. Can you guys play most games? Does anyone with a gaming computer have these issues?

> 
> Man I can honestly say I have never had an issue with memory leak or fps in KSP. Can you guys play most games? Does anyone with a gaming computer have these issues?

As a person with i7 chip in my computer. I can dissagree. my mods eat my ram 24/7
Sooo awesome

> 
> As a person with i7 chip in my computer. I can dissagree. my mods eat my ram 24/7

Interesting, do you ever get the error playing stock? How much can you hold Squad accountable when they don't know what mods you will load or have any control over the mods...

We are nearing 100. M O A R H Y P E

> 
> Man I can honestly say I have never had an issue with memory leak or fps in KSP. Can you guys play most games? Does anyone with a gaming computer have these issues?

It depends on the OS more than the hardware IMO.
I think this is the first post of the 100th page.

Mine is!
